resources.string:
Lightning Launcher is a fast, light and extremely customizable launcher (also known as "home screen replacement", or "shell"). 
Lightning is the launcher of choice for people who wants a butter smooth, light on memory and tailor-made home screen replacement. 
Unlike most traditional launchers, Lightning lets you place items everywhere on the desktop, not only to the left or right sides, but also on pages above and below. Think at the desktop as an unlimited canvas extending in both horizontal and vertical directions instead of a strip, and you will get the idea. 
This mean: as many pages as you need, more space for your apps, and faster navigation. 
Lightning has some interesting features, such as being able to put widgets in folders (and even other folders for hierarchical navigation), or letting you freely move, scale and rotate any items (note: please switch to "free mode" first to enable rotate/scale). 
Oh, and did I mentioned that LL was light on memory, leaving more RAM for your apps ? 
With its wide set of options and switches, LL is one of the most customizable launcher, albeit perhaps not the easiest to configure yet ! Agreed, as most powerful tools, LL has a learning curve. But isn't that a small price to pay to get the most exciting and unique home screen ;-) 
All comments, suggestions and bug reports are welcome. Please email your questions and bug reports to me (Pierre Hébert) at pierrox@pierrox.net, or visit the facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/LightningLauncher to learn more on what I am currently working on, or request for some feature, or simply ask a question. 
\Enjoy ! 
\Permission: 
- EXPAND_STATUS_BAR: as its name says, used for the "Show status bar" action. 
- SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS: used to set the wallpaper dimension 
- no other permission needed !

Lightning Launcher adalah Beranda alternatif untuk Android yang cepat, ringan dan dapat diatur sesuai keinginan. 
LL kini mempersiapkan daftar aplikasi. 
Jangan lewatkan panduan video untuk mempelajari lebih lanjut. 
Selamat menikmati!
Atur penampakan dan perilaku beranda saat ini
Pengaturan daftar app di Laci app
Pembebas app ringan yang terintegrasi dalam LL
Like this app and want to support it?
Lihat apa yang akan dilakukan dalam versi selanjutnya, minta fitur baru, atau laporkan kesalahan
An advanced and efficient App Drawer
Tidak ada paket bahasa anda? Bantu proyek ini dengan ikut menerjemahkan
Atur layar atau map saat ini
Masuk modus sunting otomatis saat penambahan item
Mempercepat \'kembali ke beranda\', namun memakan memory lebih
Gaya ini memiliki kolom lebih sedikit daripada yang saat ini dipakai. Lanjutkan?
Penampilan (sapu ke kiri untuk untuk pra-tayang)
Hanya modus grid, pilih lebar, warna dan posisi
Tentukan default latar belakang, bingkai, animasi,...
Pilih bagaimana item diletakkan (di grid, bebas), pilih jumlah kolom, tinggi baris, dll.
Jangan gunakan grid, memungkinkan peletakan secara bebas (termasuk skala dan rotasi)
Memungkinkan posisi ganda, satu untuk modus portrait (utama), dan satu lagi modus landscape
Selalu hentikan penggulungan pada batas halaman
Susutkan desktop sesuai item, tidak berlaku ukuran kelipatan
Hanya gulung pada satu arah saja pada satu waktu
Tutup map ketika salah satu app dijalankan
Menambah 1 piksel disekitar layar ketika animasi untuk memperbaiki animasi pada beberapa versi Android
Ubah konfigurasi saat ini dengan pengaturan dari gaya
Simpan konfigurasi layar saat ini kedalam gaya tersendiri
Hapus item di layar ini dan pulihkan gaya default
Warning: 4x scale need 16x more memory: this can exhaust device memory very rapidly.
Sentuh daerah yang diinginkan \nlalu pilih aksi di bawah ini
Enter layout edit mode to select a disabled item
Indah tapi lambat. 0: tak terlihat, 255: nampak jelas
Pra-tayang layar (bisa saja berbeda dari sebenarnya)
No backup archive to restore yet
Backup error, please check that there is enough storage space on the sdcard
Restore error, please check that the backup archive is valid and can be read
Do you really want to delete it ?
The system wallpaper is shared by all desktops and the app drawer
This wallpaper is displayed above the system wallpaper. Each desktop can have its own wallpaper
Use a fully opaque color to disable the wallpaper. Use a transparent color to tint the wallpaper
To get help on a setting, long tap on it.
Setup multiple desktops, their order, the home desktop, icons, labels,…

The "My Drawer" view lets you fully customize your app drawer. \nIn this mode items can be freely moved on a large canvas and folder can be used to organize apps. \nTry to zoom out and select "Edit layout" : you will discover that apps can be put on left, right, top and bottom pages too, letting you manage apps in your very own way.
empty folder \ndrag&drop items over the folder icon \nto populate it
An installation of Lightning Launcher has been detected. \nAll data will now be imported. When this is done you can safely uninstall Lightning Launcher and use Lightning Launcher eXtreme instead.
Something went wrong during file copy!
Close the app drawer upon app launch
Apply an ADW icon pack or revert custom icons
Works for themes providing an icon/app table
This icon pack as no app/icon table
Including custom icon effect and inner scale
This shortcut is not associated with a valid app. Would you like to get it from the app store or pick another app ?
Only on devices that support it (long tap for more)
Swap items if they overlap (grid mode only)
Prevent gaps between items (grid mode only)
Go to home desktop, then zoom 100p.
Browse and apply templates, export for APK
Long tap to read the tutorial
This template has been designed for a newer version of Lightning Launcher, would you like to update now ?
The template is ready to be applied but some warnings have been found:
- this template has been designed with Lightning Launcher eXtreme, it may use some features not available in this version.
- this template does not exactly match your screen characteristics. Some elements may not be displayed correctly.
- your device is not able to restore widgets automatically, you will need to manually recreate them.
Could not load this widget \nTap to install or pick a new one
Honour pinned items in edit mode
Stop points are always displayed, even in normal mode
Long tap to learn how to use nine patch
Allow only a single opened folder at a time
Use the desktop size to compute the cell size, not the panel size
Select the desktop to be shown on the lock screen. Long tap for a tutorial.
Select or disable the lock screen
Select a desktop, tap and cancel to disable it
The lock screen has been disabled.
The Unlocker Plugin is not installed yet. Tap to install
Before to lock, please ensure that this desktop can be unlocked safely, either using an unlocker or an \"Unlock screen\" action.
Stop points conflict with the \'Snap to page\' option: it has been automatically turned off.
Rotate the item upon screen rotation
Unknown or deleted script, a new one has been created.
This script may be in use in other actions. Are you sure to delete it ?
Replace: fully replace the current setup
Merge: keep the current setup, import the template as new desktops
Update: keep desktops and items, apply style from desktops in the template only
You are about to apply the template \'%s\', do you want to make a backup of your current setup first ?
Apps launched from the lock screen will unlock at the same time
The desktop can be scrolled beyond its limit
Identify this item with a label
Unleash the power of LL by displaying advanced options (take effect upon reload)
Warning: script execution is currently disabled in general settings
Your apps are here. \nYou can launch apps from there and start adding apps to the desktop: long press on some app and select \"Add to launcher\". \nTap to learn more.

You just added a folder. Folders can contain apps, widgets or even other folders. \nDrag some item over it, wait a bit for the move to be confirmed (at the end of the animation), then drop the object: it will be moved inside the folder. \nTap to learn more on folders.
Your first panel is here. \nPanels behave a bit like folders: drag item over it, wait a bit for the move to be confirmed (end of the animation), then drop the object. \nTap to learn more on panels.

This is your desktop. Long tap to add objects (apps, widgets, folders, more) and access settings. \nPages are created as soon as you drag objects over them: to the left and right sides, but also to the top and bottom sides. \nTap to learn more on LL concepts.
Display the action bar on scroll
Pass these data to the script (leave blank if not used):
Experimental: when reaching a side, items from the other side are displayed as if the desktop were a sphere
Use alpha to adjust the saturation
Set status and navigation bars visibility, transparency, etc.
Constraint the ripples inside the item\'s boundaries

A side bar is a customized folder. Drop items here to move them into the side bar. Tap on the icon to toggle the side bar, or assign it to a gesture or any other event. Change the window alignment values to dock it on other sides.
A page indicator displays the current page position in the desktop. By default this is item pinned and not clickable. Enter the edit layout mode first to change its style, color, etc.
A stop point is a tool to create custom scrolling scheme: the desktop will stop scrolling at stop points. Long tap on a stop point to edit its properties. Stop points are only visible in edit mode.

A bookmark saves the current position and scale of your desktop. Once the bookmark has been created you can move it anywhere else, tapping on it will automatically bring you back to the memorized desktop position. It works inside panels and folders too!
Swipe from the left edge to reveal the drawer

The seamless mode is automatically disabled in edit mode, otherwise empty pages wouldn\'t be reachable. Be aware that some items may then suddenly disappear when entering edit mode: they are just displayed at their original position in the desktop instead of being "wrapped". \nSeamless mode is enabled again when exiting edit mode.

Hint: in order to create a new page, simply add or drag some item on it. 
This works for pages above and below too, try it! 
 
(you can safely delete this hint)
Hint: use one or two fingers swipe up to reveal the user menu (you can customize it), long tap somewhere to display a contextual menu. \n \n(you can safely delete this hint)
The Script Importer is not installed
Would you like to install it from the Play Store?
At least one category need to be selected…
Please unlock Lightning to use this feature

Upgrade to the Full Lightning version to benefit from more features: 
 
- Advanced app drawer (folders, action bar, categories). 
- Add, remove, rearrange desktops at will. 
- Per desktop wallpaper. 
- Unread count, badges and dynamic text. 
- Customizable lock screen. 
- Integrated app killer. 
 
If you already unlocked Lightning in the past, please select "OK" to re-activate this version.
This feature is not available in the trial version
Upgrade to get the most out of Lightning

Thank you for testing Lightning! 
 
The app will run in trial mode for 7 days: all features are enabled and can be used without restriction during this period. After the trial period, the app will still be usable but editing will not be enabled anymore. 
 
If you like this app and wish to support it, please consider purchasing the key to unlock it. 
 
Thank you!

Lightning need your feedback! 
 
Would you like to take a few seconds to rate this app on the Play Store?
This is a sample lock screen that you can customize at will. \nAdd apps or widgets then activate it through the lock screen settings (tap here).
Please read the documentation before to change this value
Custom views are designed for advanced use cases. It enables Android view creation through scripting and as a consequence it requires advanced scripting and Android knowledge.
One or more widget will be deleted. Widget deletion cannot be fully undone and you may have to recreate the widget content. Do you wish to continue?
Style copied, now use \'Paste the style\' to replicate it.
I think I already told you there were no script ;-)
Please do not insist, there is no script here.
Well, that\'s enough, please stop. Otherwise I\'ll have to create a script.
OK, if this is the only way to be in peace, let\'s go, I will now create a script…
No custom view. \nTap to try again.
Switching to \'My Drawer\' view for customization
Display a desktop above other apps
Select or disable the floating desktop
Select a desktop, tap and cancel to disable it
For debug purpose only (green: show, red: hide)
The floating desktop is hidden when launching an app
The floating desktop has been disabled
Changes will take effect on next load
Set a custom label \n(basic HTML is allowed)
The overlay desktop requires the permission to draw over other apps
When locked, the floating desktop is disabled. It is re-enabled upon unlock.
To accomplish this task, Lightning Launcher needs your permission:
look for backup and templates archives on the external storage
write backups and templates on the external storage
read font files on the external storage
read images on the external storage
store extracted images on the external storage
extract template files to temporary storage
make the script available on external storage so that another editor can read it
query the phone call log for missed calls
read the number of unread SMS
directly dial a phone number from the home screen
The container is now locked and can\'t be modified. Long tap an empty space and select unlock to enable editing again.
The user menu is not available in the app drawer.
Please select a desktop\nfor your live wallpaper
React to touches as a normal app, allowing wallpaper swipe and scroll
The Lightning Live Wallpaper is not yet enabled\n\nSupport the developer and help making Lightning the best launcher ever!
No app shortcut for this item

In order to access app shortcuts, Lightning Launcher needs to be the default launcher, otherwise it has no app shortcut permission.\n\nNote: you may see this message twice before you can select \'Always\' in the launcher selection box.

resources.string: Stop otomatis penggulungan pada pinggir layar
Select a backup archive to restore
Single finger scroll in edit mode
Take effect upon restart. Prefer memory efficiency over speed
Tap on an item to copy its style
Atur default huruf, warna, icon, bingkai dan lainnya

You are a long time user of the free version of Lighting Launcher, thank you. 
 
Although this version has been replaced with a trial version, you will still benefit from all previously existing features for free, as well as most improvements made in the full app since the last update. 
 
If you wish to support this app, please consider purchasing the unlock key at a discounted loyalty price. 
 
Thanks!
